General.Name: Sportking India Limited
General.Description: Sportking India Limited manufactures, purchases, and sells cotton, synthetic, and blended yarns in India. It engages in the yarns and fibers dyeing and processing business. The company also provides knitted fabrics. In addition, it produces T-shirts, shirts, sweatshirts, sweaters, jackets, jeans, trousers, track pants, tracksuits, Bermuda and shorts, and nightwear for boys and men; and tops, tunics, shirts, kurtis, sweatshirts, sweaters, cardigans, jeans, trousers, leggings, track pants, tracksuits, shorts, nightwear, and lingerie for girls and ladies. The company sells its products through retail outlets, as well as through its online retail store. It also exports its products to approximately 30 countries. Sportking India Limited was founded in 1977 and is based in Ludhiana, India.
